thread.section_title: Texas Longhorns News - Sports News for Dallas, Texas
thread.title: Twitter Reaction: Texas 'can't blame this one on the refs'
thread.title_full: Twitter Reaction: Texas 'can't blame this one on the refs' | Dallas Morning News

author: Nick Castillo
title: Twitter Reaction: Texas 'can't blame this one on the refs'
text:
Texas lost to No. 4 TCU, 50-7 on Saturday.
Twitter reacted heavily to the Longhorns' second blowout loss of the sea son.
Here are a few reactions from Twitter
Dan Wolken, USA Today
Texas fans should have protested the Big 12 about TCU having better players.
— Dan Wolken (@DanWolken) October 3, 2015 Bruce Feldman, Fox Sports
#Longhorns wasn't little time melting down today. #TCU already up 16-0. #UT being outgained 86 to minus 20.
— Bruce Feldman (@BruceFeldmanCFB) October 3, 2015 Darren Rovell, ESPN
The last time the Texas Longhorns were 1-4, Elvis' "Hound Dog" was at the top of the charts (1956)
— Darren Rovell (@darrenrovell) October 3, 2015 Clay Travis, Fox Sports
Texas really might go 3-9 this year. Only wins I see are Kansas and Iowa State. And I'm not sure about Iowa State.
— Clay Travis (@ClayTravisBGID) October 3, 2015 Stewart Mandel, Fox Sports
Can't blame this one on the refs.
— Stewart Mandel (@slmandel) October 3, 2015 Kirk Herbstreit, ESPN
. @TCUFootball and @TCUCoachP could name their number today at home vs the Horns!! They were up 30-0 in the FIRST Qtr!!! #TEXvsTCU
— Kirk Herbstreit (@KirkHerbstreit) October 3, 2015
Texas 0 TCU 50 4th Qtr @TCUFootball Ouch!
— Kirk Herbstreit (@KirkHerbstreit) October 3, 2015 Skip Bayless, ESPN
Obviously losing 50-7 at TCU is another blow to Charlie Strong's Texas tenure - and here comes explosive undefeated arch rival Oklahoma.
— Skip Bayless (@RealSkipBayless) October 3, 2015 Chris Fowler, ESPN
Perhaps the worst 1st quarter in Texas history concludes. Frogs 30, Horns nil. #TEXvsTCU
— Chris Fowler (@cbfowler) October 3, 2015 Former Texas wide receiver Jordan Shipley
It wasn't long ago that a 10 win season at Texas was a disappointment
— Jordan Shipley (@Jordan_Shipley) October 3, 2015 Former Longhorn defensive back Aaron Williams
Embarrassing Texas smh 30 in the first quarter though ðŸ‘ regardless I bleed burnt orange but dang I can't even talk right now
— Aaron Williams (@ajwilliams23) October 3, 2015 Former Texas cornerback Quandre Diggs:
Y'all quick to blame coach strong tho but he only has been able to have ONE true recruiting class.. remember that!
— Quandre Diggs (@qdiggs6) October 3, 2015
I'm appalled.
— Quandre Diggs (@qdiggs6) October 3, 2015
The o line just out there literally not doing anything.
— Quandre Diggs (@qdiggs6) October 3, 2015 On Twitter:
 @Nick_Castillo74
